name: Baldi's Better Basics v1.0 to Field Trip Demo
name_original: Baldi's Better Basics v1.0 to Field Trip Demo
description:
Baldi's Better Basics v1.0 to Field Trip Demo is a game developed by ivankiv75@gmail.com. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Baldi's Better Basics v1.0 to Field Trip Demo on PC, macOS and Linux. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
